explains: n. 附加设备，附属物；（邮件）附件；文件附件；喜欢，依恋；（临时的）隶属，委派；信念，拥护；连接，连接物；扣押
wordGroup: emotional attachment 情绪依恋；情感依附
attachment point 阀值；附着点；附保点；接合点

sentences.en: The message contains Unicode characters and has been sent as a binary attachment.
sentences.cn: 这条信息含有统一码字符，已经以二进制附件形式发送。

sentences.en: When you send an e-mail you can also send a file as an attachment and that file can be a graphic, a program, a sound or whatever.
sentences.cn: 当发送电子邮件时，你还可以把一份文件作为附件发送，该文件可以是图片、程序、或声音文件等。

sentences.en: For simplicity, use only one attachment for our test.
sentences.cn: 为方便起见，我们的测试仅使用一个附件。
